question: What is Fulflow.io?
answer: Fulflow.io is our in-house, custom-built fulfillment software designed to centralize and streamline every part of the fulfillment process. From tracking inventory and managing orders to monitoring shipments in real time, Fulflow.io gives you full visibility and control in one easy-to-use platform.
